title: Expenses and benefits: cash prizes for employer-run competitions

details.alternative_title: Employer's tax and reporting for cash prizes in employer-run competitions
details.overview: Tax and reporting rules for employers running cash prize competitions for employees
details.body:
Cash prizes for any competitions you run that are only open to your employees count as earnings. As an employer, you donâ€™t need to report these payments to HMRC.

You will need to:

  • add the amount to your employee’s other earnings
  • deduct and pay PAYE tax and Class 1 National Insurance through payroll
